text: Orb Sceptre Throne is the fourth fantasy novel by Canadian author Ian Cameron Esslemont set in the world of the Malazan Book of the Fallen, co-created with Esslemont's friend and colleague Steven Erikson. Orb Sceptre Throne is the fourth of six novels by Esslemont to take place in the Malazan world. ==References== Category:2012 novels Category:High fantasy novels Category:Novels of the Malazan Empire
title: Orb Sceptre Throne
